search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Donately (donately.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Donately can be found at: [https://donately.com/pricing](https://donately.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Donation Platform & Online Fundraising Pricing | Donately

extracted_content.content:
Donation Platform & Online Fundraising Pricing | Donately
===============
     

Press Alt+1 for screen-reader mode, Alt+0 to cancel[Accessibility Screen-Reader Guide, Feedback, and Issue Reporting](https://accessibe.com/blog/knowledgebase/screen-reader-guide)

This website stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used to improve your website experience and provide more personalized services to you, both on this website and through other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Privacy Policy.

We won't track your information when you visit our site. But in order to comply with your preferences, we'll have to use just one tiny cookie so that you're not asked to make this choice again.

AcceptDecline

Pricing on your terms
=====================

Our pricing plans are designed to give any organization great features at an affordable rate.

[Volume pricing](https://donately.com/pricing#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0)[Monthly billing](https://donately.com/pricing#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1)[Annual billing](https://donately.com/pricing#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)

Custom Enterprise Pricing
=========================

When your donation volume is high, your pricing should work in your favor—not against you. With Donately’s enterprise pricing, you get access to **deeply discounted rates**, tailored support, and tools designed to scale with your success. [See if your organization qualifies!](https://donately.com/get-started)

### Savings

Lower your platform fee to just **0.5%**—a major cost advantage for orgs raising $500K+ annually.

### Confidence

Work with a platform that understands complex, high-volume operations—and supports them.

### Support

Enterprise pricing comes with priority support and strategic guidance from our team.

[Get started today](https://donately.com/get-started)[Compare plans](https://donately.com/pricing#compare)

### Raising $1,000,000 on Donately would save $40,000 even over so-called free platforms.

Pay as you go
=============

### Core

Get a live donation form in minutes!

$0/mo

4% Platform Fee

### Starter

Everything you need to embed giving into your website.

$19/mo

3.5% Platform Fee

### Team

Great for small teams wanting to customize their giving experience.

$69/mo

2% Platform Fee

[Sign Up FREE](https://dashboard.donately.com/universal_signup)[Compare Plans](https://donately.com/pricing#compare)

Most Popular

### Custom pricing

Customize a pricing plan that’s best for you, with free onboarding support, training, integrations, and rates as low as 0.5%.

[Contact Sales](https://get.donately.com/contact-sales)

Pay as you go
=============

### Free

Get a live donation form in minutes!

$0/mo

4% Platform Fee

### Starter

Everything you need to embed giving into your website.

$15/mo 19/mo

3.5% Platform Fee

### Team

Great for small teams wanting to customize their giving experience.

$49/mo $69/mo

2% Platform Fee

[Sign Up FREE](https://dashboard.donately.com/universal_signup)[Compare Plans](https://donately.com/pricing#compare)

Most Popular

### Custom pricing

Customize a pricing plan that’s best for you, with free onboarding support, training, integrations, and rates as low as 0.5%.

[Contact Sales](https://get.donately.com/contact-sales)

### How much are FREE platforms costing you?

"We've seen a handful of platforms promote themselves as "free", only to collect upwards of 12% with donor-paid-fees. We wanted to do donor fees different, where you set the amounts and you get the extra revenue, not us. **On average Donately accounts can save over $40,000 for every $1M raised."**

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63334c2c8ea58f2277b74981/63cafef7ddf2c31c7e93f6ca_1659458906719-1.jpg)

Javan Van Gronigen

Co-Founder, Head of Creative

[Get started](https://donately.com/get-started)

[Get started](https://donately.com/get-started)

[Sign up Today](https://dashboard.donately.com/universal_signup)

### Why waste money when we can help you launch for less.

Our top-rate support team can help you with everything from initial setup to long-term support.

[Request services](https://donately.com/get-started)

CUSTOMIZATION

### **Donation forms, buttons & widgets  
**

Get your forms and widgets setup and installed on your site in less than one day.

Customer Support

### **Optimized onboarding with slack**

Have daily communications with your success manager using Slack, the web's most popular collaboration and communication tool.

Integrations

### **Connect your technology stack**

Have Donately connect your tools and software so your donor data is everywhere it needs to be.

![Image 6: Stripe logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63334c2c8ea58f2277b74981/6344632c59b9f256d509f144_M_White_Solid%402x.png)

![Image 7: Paypal Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63334c2c8ea58f2277b74981/6344632c90b00dde7dd79efa_PP_logo.png)

Donately's platform fees are not inclusive of payment processing fees. We proudly partner with Stripe & PayPal for all transaction processing.  
  
‍**For credit card transactions, Stripe & PayPal charge 2.9% + $0.30.  
For ACH/Direct Bank Transfer transactions, Stripe charges 0.8%, with a cap of $5.  
‍**Just like Donately, both Stripe and PayPal love nonprofits! They both offer discounted processing rates for eligible organizations. For more information see the following pages:

[Stripe for nonprofits](https://support.stripe.com/questions/fee-discount-for-non-profit-organizations)

[Paypal for nonprofits](https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/donations)

Trusted by thousands of schools, churches and organizations
-----------------------------------------------------------

Secure Forms & Campaign Pages

NO SETUP FEES OR HIDDEN COSTS

COMPLETE CUSTOMIZATION

CUSTOM PRICING AS LOW AS .5%

5 MINUTES TO SIGN UP

NO LIMITED FUNCTIONS

INTEGRATE WITH EASE

NO CONTRACTS

[Get started now](https://donately.com/get-started)

Donately's donation platform pricing is designed to support nonprofits and organizations as they grow their online fundraising.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Platform fees are additional to payment processing fees by Stripe and PayPal.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic plan for live donation forms.

additional_fees.fee_description: Stripe and PayPal fees: 2.9% + $0.30 for credit cards, 0.8% for ACH transfers.
